attributes.action: Remove private health from members of parliament and make M.P's use the N.H.S.
attributes.additional_details: The NHS is an excellent institution that is good enough for all of us, if private companies include BUPA health care it is part of a wage agreement or "perk".
attributes.background:
All citizens are allowed to use the N.H.S , Members of Parliament are paid enough.

M.P's get free BUPA health care as a right of office why ?.

rejection.details: MPs are not entitled to BUPA health care as a right of office, so we're not sure what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take.
